decision_conditions: It has not been demonstrated that the materials used in any exterior work of the proposed development would be of a similar appearance to those used in the construction of the exterior of the existing dwellinghouse, in conflict with Condition A.3 (a) of Schedule 2, Part 1, Class A of The Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

It has not been indicated that any window inserted on a wall or roof slope forming a side elevation of the dwellinghouse would be non-opening unless the parts of the window which can be opened are more than 1.7 metres above the floor of the room in which the window is installed,  in conflict with Conditions B.2(c)(ii) and C.2(b)of Schedule 2, Part 1, Class A of The Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).
description: Erection of hip to gable roof extension with rear dormer and juliet balcony. Installation of 3nos front rooflights.
